attributes.action: Get better lunches in school and have enough food for everyone
attributes.additional_details: Because a lot of school don't have enough for everyone and some kids don't get anything
attributes.background: No more cold food and get more food

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about school meals, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's not clear if you want the Government to make free school meals available to all school students, or change the rules about the type of food schools are required to provide.

The Government produces the school food standards that apply to all maintained schools, and academies that were founded before 2010 and after June 2014. You can read these here: https://www.gov.uk/school-meals-healthy-eating-standards

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you start a new petition you'd need to provide your full name.
